text:
Trump Trolls Perez Over DNC Chairman Election: ‘I Could Not Be Happier for Him’, or for the GOP by Ken Meyer | 7:08 pm, February 25th, 2017 
As Tom Perez takes his place as the new chairman of the Democratic National Committee, President Trump seemed to offer a bit of a trolling with his commentary on the matter. 
The former Labor Secretary was elected on Saturday afternoon , and, during his acceptance speech, he quickly named Minnesota Representative Keith Ellison as his deputy chair. As for Trump, the president had this to say in response: Congratulations to Thomas Perez, who has just been named Chairman of the DNC. I could not be happier for him, or for the Republican Party! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 25, 2017 
Based on the last part of Trump’s tweet, there’s reason to believe that Trump’s comments were a bit tongue-in-cheek. Perez took it in stride, however, based on his reply: Call me Tom. And don’t get too happy. @keithellison and I, and Democrats united across the country, will be your worst nightmare. https://t.co/fu7WvLofrD 
— Tom Perez (@TomPerez) February 25, 2017
